text: a taruvata musa tana gaduvu purti cesi, tana kutumbam varini tisukoni potundaga, tur parvatapu dikkulo oka mantanu cusadu. (Appudu) tana inti varito annadu: "Agandi! Nenu oka mantanu cusanu, bahusa! Nenu akkadi nundi edaina manci vartanu tisukoni ravaccu, leda oka agni koravinaina! Appudu miru danito cali kacukovaccu
